products.title: Mirren Perfect Fit Sunwood
products.description: This magnificent perfect fit sunwood blind comes in a range of great fabrics - here we have it in mirren. In addition, this blind includes controls to the left, no frame and no brackets (which are all options).

products.title: Morena Perfect Fit Sunwood
products.description: This delightful perfect fit sunwood blind comes in a range of quality fabrics - here we have it in morena. In addition, this blind includes controls to the left, no frame and no brackets (which are all options).

products.title: Morena Perfect Fit
products.description: An sumptuous beige colour, the morena 25mm perfect fit blindwill bring warmth into any room. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.

products.title: Kalm Perfect Fit
products.description: Perfect fit kalm wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Mirren Perfect Fit
products.description: A subtle cream shade, the mirren 25mm perfect fit blind will give any room that warm feel. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.

products.title: Ritz Luxury Cream Roller Blind
products.description: This blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Lux Dark Cream Roller Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. With the woven fabric texture on the front of this blind, you can add a literal touch of class to your windows. Being a blackout fabric makes this blind perfect for bedrooms and living rooms where you need to block all of the light - like when trying to sleep or when there is glare on your tv.

products.title: Lux Dark Butterscotch Roller Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. With the woven fabric texture on the front of this blind, you can add a literal touch of class to your windows. Being a blackout fabric makes this blind perfect for bedrooms and living rooms where you need to block all of the light - like when trying to sleep or when there is glare on your tv.

products.title: Day & Night Woven Dovetail
products.description: With its earthy grey colour and premium texture, the day & night woven dovetail roller blind is an eye-catching window covering. The neutral colour twins well with minimalist interiors. Combining brilliant light control with a unique, aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Day & Night Woven Linen
products.description: In its subtle cream colour, the day & night woven linen roller blind is both visually appealing and practical. Perfect for any home with neutral interior decor, this blind combines brilliant light control with a unique, aesthetic design, and will not fail to enhance your home. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Belmont Cream Roller Blind
products.description: The belmont cream roller blind will add style to your window with its textured stripes. This gorgeous neutral colour can be paired in many different ways and will really bring your interior together. The light cream is a beautiful addition to any home. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Veil Cream Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The veil cream voile blind has a destinctive stripe running down the fabric which is a plain smooth finish. This is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Pura Ivory Voile Roller Blind
products.description: Thepura ivory voile is a soft cream colour with a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Voile blinds, also known as sheer blinds, are a great way to give your home privacy whilst still letting the daylight in.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Almond - Vertical Blind
products.description: The nutty, creamy oatmeal of the almond, and the subtle style that it emits, belies its highly practical qualities. The roma (fr) range is flame-retardant, making it perfect for either a commercial property or a domestic one, and the louvres are easily adjusted to allow you more or less light or privacy. Feeling bold? Hang the almond against a bold, tropical purple feature wall in the dining room, where it will provide a necessary break to a bold, albeit beautiful, shade.

products.title: Deanna, Soft Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: The pretty, neutral shade of the deanna in soft cream is an easily coordinated colour, fitting in with a wide range of colour schemes around the home. An easy mixture of the traditional and the contemporary, this blind brings class and sophistication wherever it goes. Use amidst dark chocolate and soft mocha browns in your living or dining room, or give a rustic kitchen a classy, modern twist. The soft cream will look especially stylish when coupled with taupe walls and dark woods.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Oyster - Vertical Blind
products.description: The oyster blind, from the origin (blackout) range, is subtlety at its best. The soft cream fabric radiates luxurious sophistication, whilst still maintaining a confident neutrality that helps it to match almost any colour. For a country, shaker-style kitchen, sit the oyster amongst matching cream units, with wooden worktops and rustic furniture, accompanied by pretty florals and vintage-style appliances.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Oyster Grey - Vertical Blind
products.description: So subtle in colour that it's barely there, the origin (blackout) in oyster grey offers just a hint of colour to blend in beautifully with existing dcor. Despite its understated texture and hue, this is a mighty blackout blind, ideal for blocking out the outside light. For a neutral look in a home office or bedroom, team the oyster grey with taupes and soft greys, to add calm and serenity to your home.

products.title: Infusion Asc Magnolia Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc magnolia perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.description: Order from the skyline (blackout) collection before 10am and select fasttrack at checkout for next working day delivery. Featuring simple, plain colours and a pvc backing to help to block the light out when you need to get to sleep, the skyline (blackout) collection are some of their most popular skylight blinds. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Galaxy Asc Blackout Calico Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their galaxy blackout range, where advanced solar control (asc) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.

Crafted with blackout material, it wont allow light to enter into your room when closed and the electrical operation makes it easy to operate. The blind is also treated with pollergen, this neutralises pollen so it doesnt disturb hayfever sufferers.

products.description: Anthology macaroon cream combines an intricate countryside weave with a rich and homely creamy shade that instantly makes you feel at home. It's a subtle infusion of warmth and refinement that is just perfect when you want to add a gentle finish to any room in the house. Think about how you want to create a guest bedroom that will instantly make your visitors feel at home. A few country landscapes on the wall, warm white bulbs in the bedside lamps, and of course a few throws over the end of the bed.

products.title: Cotswold, Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Pretty and subtle, the cotswold in dove grey has satin finish, with the faintest of sheens and a detectable wood grain aesthetic and texture. The paint colour is a pale grey, perfect for either contemporary or vintage settings. For a sweet and romantic pastel colour palette, group the dove grey with pale pinks and soft lilacs. Choose one for the walls, or paint opposite walls in each, then furnish the room with painted white or matching grey pieces.

products.title: Cotswold, Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: With the faint sheen of its satin paint, the cotswold in smoke grey places a pale grey tone on thick wooden slats, which are treated to prevent cracking and warping, ensuring that this blind will stand the test of time. A matching pelmet, rails, and acorns provide a sleek and unobstructed appearance. Fashion a plain bedroom into a trendy, up-to-date designer haven by pitting the smoke grey against sunny primrose yellow walls.

products.title: Cotswold, Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.description: Bring a subtle sense of class to your home by blending in the cotswold in oyster, a painted, satin-finish venetian blind with a beautiful cream tone. Its luxe colour even stretches to its included accessories, such as the wooden pelmet and bottom rail. For a bright and summery vibe, all year round, pair the oyster with pretty coral hues, in varying tones. Paint a window wall in the master bedroom a bold and vivacious coral, and accent matching cream bedlinen with coral-toned cushions and throws.
